name: Kitty & Mouse Run
description:
Let's play amazing Kitty and Mouse Run Game. It's amazing famous cartoon game like tom and jerry.

Kitty wan't to catch mouse and mouse run faster. So are you ready for help? Tap to single jump and double jump and beware from other optical and collect much as possible cheese. Create your best score.

Features:
=======
- Endless running game.
- Colourful graphics interface.
- After game over choice to collect lives.
- Challenge your friends.
- Supported IOS11.

So are you ready to beat me! Download Now....
